html:
7.9.20  12:17 am   hey bill, why is the sky blue and sometimes pink/purple/orange?

      it's what you requested

7.9.20  12:04 am   whats a good thing to do when there's nothing to do

      invent a new thing

7.9.20  12:02 am   How do you manage to motivate yourself to learn all these different instruments and programs? 

      ability to communicate, might be the major motivating factor

7.8.20  11:31 pm   what gives you the feeling that everything will be okay

      the morning sun

7.8.20  11:29 pm   How did you come up with "And The Day Goes On" you are such a genius

      i did it by repeatedly joining and quitting Mensa, to unlock its secret additional levels

7.8.20  11:29 pm   how many grains of sand do you need to have a pile of sand

      at least 3

7.8.20  11:26 pm   How do you come up with the tunes for your music?

      melodies are are like ghosts. you just have to wait until one of them haunts you. but the question is, will you be ready to catch it when it does

7.8.20  11:24 pm   is cereal a soup

      cereal is nothing

7.8.20  11:16 pm   opinion on sunshine?

      hard to draw

7.8.20  11:03 pm   Any opinions on triangles?

      could come in handy

7.8.20  10:57 pm   what albums are you enjoying a lot right now?

      what's an album

7.8.20  10:37 pm   what are some things that inspire you lately?

      light

7.8.20  10:25 pm   opinion on Idaho?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but it's smaller than michigan

7.8.20  10:11 pm   when you going make your new video

      first let me make a correction there, that is no where near the number of new videos i am going to make

7.8.20  10:07 pm   What's your favorite animal?

      computers

7.8.20  10:04 pm   What's your favorite song/video of yours that you've made so far?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.8.20  9:47 pm   How do you find motivation?

      my first question is, what made you interested in finding that motivation

7.8.20  9:39 pm   Do you intend for your lyrics to be humorous?

      only insofar as they are not funnier than planet earth itself

7.8.20  9:31 pm   are you creating your own video software ?

      oh that would explain a lot

7.8.20  9:30 pm   How to fix my potato

      maybe some googly eyes

7.8.20  9:28 pm   Who is the best person in the world

      might be you

7.8.20  9:12 pm   what do you do with horses?

      you could take turns dressing up as other animals

7.8.20  9:11 pm   how do i become a good singer?

      sing everything. sing your breakfast, if you can

7.8.20  9:11 pm   Do you like crackers?

      maybe if they were somehow more colorful

7.8.20  9:10 pm   What will your next songs title be

      i can't tell you

7.8.20  9:09 pm   How do I eat strawberries?

      just suck on them forever

7.8.20  9:09 pm   thoughts on lawns

      they are strong

7.8.20  8:57 pm   Should I use the colors Red or Green for a drawing?

      sure

7.8.20  9:04 pm   we miss you bill, can't wait for you to return triumphantly. that's not a question but uhhh what's the most challenging part about learning your new video editor?

      i'm not learning any editor yet. first dealing with how the content is created in the first place

7.8.20  8:47 pm   Opinion on oatmeal?

      1 piece is called 1 oatmail

7.8.20  8:43 pm   bill are you still sane?

      yes, i do have that skillset

7.8.20  8:40 pm   Is the sun sun?

      Let me perform some calculations

7.8.20  8:37 pm   I just did a questionable thing. 

      oh now you've got me wondering what the thing was

7.8.20  8:31 pm   how do you explain things

      you must love the things

7.8.20  8:20 pm   how many rooms does your house have

      i actually have multiple houses per room, if that makes sense

7.8.20  8:14 pm   How can you be a person

      just start tapping things very gently. that's exactly the kind of thing persons do

7.8.20  8:10 pm   are you allergic to capital letters

      not allergic, ..... addicted

7.8.20  8:10 pm   Can you make a new song?

      sure

7.8.20  7:47 pm   Are you a cactus

      no but i can see why you would think that

7.8.20  7:43 pm   When is your next video going to be released

     i'm having a countdown timer

     and will it be out on dvd later in the future?

     what the heck is dvd

7.8.20  7:41 pm   what is your favorite video that you made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.8.20  7:26 pm   what time is it

      23:51

7.8.20  7:08 pm   What is your opinion on capital letters?

      pretty cool
7.8.20  7:06 pm   What did you call me?
7.8.20  7:06 pm

7.8.20  6:21 pm   why are your videos so good?

      they might be about you

7.8.20  6:12 pm   Could you make an actual music video?

      sure

7.8.20  6:07 pm   What does nothing look like? 

      something

7.8.20  5:58 pm   how can i be sure when the art that i'm working on is done?

     you get to decide

      related, can art ever be done?

     sort of

7.8.20  5:55 pm   are you able to be serious?

      yes, this is something we are all born with, as a result of the innate seriousness of our world
